fields.name: deleted
fields.description: true if the item is deleted.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of item. One of 'job', 'story', 'comment', 'poll', or 'pollopt'.

fields.name: by
fields.description: The username of the item's author.

fields.name: time
fields.description: Creation date of the item, in Unix Time.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The comment, story or poll text. HTML.

fields.name: dead
fields.description: true if the item is dead.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The comment's parent: either another comment or the relevant story.

fields.name: kids
fields.description: The ids of the item's comments, in ranked display order.

fields.name: score
fields.description: The story's score, or the votes for a pollopt.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the story, poll or job. HTML.

fields.name: parts
fields.description: A list of related pollopts, in display order.

fields.name: descendants
fields.description: In the case of stories or polls, the total comment count.
